pr_title: Update .NET version checks to be more correct when Windows services when installing master and agent on platforms with modern .NET versions

timeline.message: Update .NET version checks to be more correct
Update .NET version checks to be more correct

timeline.bodyText: There is some duplication below which could be prevented IMHO. Not a blocker
timeline.author: oleg-nenashev

replies.bodyText: Updated. I've never seen a library any uglier than this org.jinterop.winreg.
replies.author: nxtn

timeline.bodyText: It is used in  3 plugins outside the Jenkins core: https://github.com/search?q=org%3Ajenkinsci+%22hudson.util.jna.RegistryKey%22&type=Code . All of them implement try/catch properly, but I agree this enhancement would help. Maybe we should note it in the a developer API changelog entry, but it is fairly minor
timeline.author: oleg-nenashev

timeline.message: Update .NET version checks to be more correct
Update .NET version checks to be more correct

timeline.bodyText: Do we really need to worry about 1.0 or other REALLY old frameworks?
timeline.author: slide

replies.bodyText: Done for completeness. We could directly return false as well.
replies.author: nxtn
